title: Sputnik International - Breaking News & Analysis - Radio, Photos, Videos, Infographics: Illinois Lawmakers Fail in Effort to Make Obama’s Birthday a State Holiday

organizations.name: sputnik international - breaking news & analysis - radio

text:
Illinois Lawmakers Fail in Effort to Make Obama’s Birthday a State Holiday © AP Photo/ Alex Brandon 4 114 2 0 A referendum in Illinois to make the birthday of the 44th president of the United States, Barack Obama, a state holiday has narrowly failed to reach a majority in the state’s House of Representatives. 
A bill in the Illinois House to make Obama's August 4 birthday a holiday fell six votes short of a majority in the legislative body of the former president's adopted home state. © Photo: Youtube/Sputnik First Female Astronaut Celebrates 80th Birthday House Representative Steve Andersson, a Republican, allowed that even though the official vote failed, the date should be made honorary . 
Andersson suggested that Obama would recognize that the cash-strapped state of Illinois would be ill-advised to give workers an additional day off, according to the Washington Examiner. ...
